title: LXQt 1.4 Desktop Arrives for Lubuntu 23.10 Users, Here’s How to Install It
description:
The latest LXQt 1.4 desktop environment is now available for Lubuntu 23.10 (Mantic Minotaur) users. Here's how to install it!

The post LXQt 1.4 Desktop Arrives for Lubuntu 23.10 Users, Here’s How to Install It appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Steam Deck OLED Is Now Available to Order with HDR Display and Bigger Battery
description:
Steam Deck OLED Linux-powered gaming handheld is now available to order with a HDR display, bigger screen and battery, and updated internals.

The post Steam Deck OLED Is Now Available to Order with HDR Display and Bigger Battery appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: HandBrake 1.7 Released with AMD VCN AV1 and NVIDIA NVENC AV1 Encoders
description:
HandBrake 1.7 open-source video transcoder app is now available for download with AMD VCN AV1 and NVIDIA NVENC AV1 encoders, as well as many goodies for Linux users.

The post HandBrake 1.7 Released with AMD VCN AV1 and NVIDIA NVENC AV1 Encoders appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
